data.text: @Atrios “Shocker: the media hasn’t made a big story about the zillionth step in surrendering to Covid, which they loudly support, and which was conveniently dropped in the late-Friday news dump!”

@Atrios Oh for sure, I’m assuming he’s treating this revelation as some sort of moral victory, and not a reflection on how this country basically conceded defeat on the most devastating health crisis in a generation
@Atrios Nate sure doesn’t have any exposure to disability twitter, if he’s seen “barely any commentary.”
@AugustJPollak Sure that is true but don't think it was his point
@Atrios Like I just do not see a reality where cable does an entire month of nonstop Russia coverage and then in April or May decides to start talking about Covid again

@Atrios Silver has been a smug piece of shit throughout the entire pandemic to a degree that almost certainly cost actual American lives, but unfortunately he’s 100% correct the media will use Russia to de facto declare Covid over forever
